<h1 align="center">Exiled</h1>
<h6 align="center">EXtended In-runtime Library for External Development</h6>
<div align="center">
    Join our
    <a href="https://discord.gg/PyUkWTg">Discord</a>
    for support.
  <p></p>
</div>
